preqs: BFB1001 or BFC1001 or BFF1001 or BFP1001 or BFW1001 and BFW2401.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFC3340, AFF3751, BFC3340, BFF3751}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BFB1001, BFC1001, BFF1001, BFF2401, BFW1001}

description: This unit examines the institutional features of futures and options markets, the use of futures, options and other derivatives in arbitraging, trading and hedging, and prices of these instruments.
